title: Superpowers 強制綁定 - 角色 → skill 映射
description:
實作角色與 superpowers skills 的強制綁定：

| 角色 | Skill(s) | 類型 |
|------|----------|------|
| mayor | dispatching-parallel-agents, finishing-a-development-branch | skill-tool |
| planner | brainstorming, writing-plans | slash-command |
| foreman | subagent-driven-development | skill-tool |
| polecat | executing-plans, receiving-code-review | mixed |
| witness | requesting-code-review | skill-tool |
| dog | test-driven-development, verification-before-completion | skill-tool |
| refinery | systematic-debugging | skill-tool |

實作項目:
- [ ] 創建 src/claude/skills.ts 定義映射
- [ ] 修改 buildRolePrompt 注入 skill 指令
- [ ] 更新所有 .gastown/agents/*.md 文件
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] src/claude/skills.ts created with ROLE_SKILLS mapping
- [ ] Slash-command vs skill-tool types distinguished
- [ ] buildRolePrompt integrates skill instructions
- [ ] All agent .md files updated
- [ ] Tests pass

title: Gastown Phase 1: 本地操作強化
description:
強化 gastown 的本地操作體驗，為未來雲端執行打下基礎。

設計文檔: docs/plans/2025-01-08-gastown-phase1-design.md

核心組件:
1. tmux 增強 - 角色標示、context 顯示
2. mprocs dashboard - rig 總覽
3. GUPP via Claude hooks - 自動觸發
4. Superpowers 強制綁定 - 角色 → skill 映射

title: mprocs Dashboard - rig 總覽介面
description:
實作 mprocs dashboard 作為 rig 總覽 UI：
- 顯示所有 rigs 狀態
- 展開/收起詳細資訊
- 關閉 mprocs 時 tmux 繼續存活

實作項目:
- [ ] 實作 `gastown dashboard` 指令
- [ ] 實作 mprocs.yaml 動態生成
- [ ] 實作狀態查詢 API
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] src/dashboard/mprocs.ts generates config
- [ ] gastown dashboard command works
- [ ] Shows all convoys with status
- [ ] Closing dashboard keeps tmux running
- [ ] Tests pass

title: Gastown Beads Redesign Implementation
description:
Migrate Gas Town from custom bd file format to bd CLI as sole state management layer.

## Progress
- [x] Phase 1: bd CLI Wrappers (6 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 2: Convoy Lifecycle Refactoring (5 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 3: Respawn Mechanism (3 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 4: Agent Definitions Update (5 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 5: Deprecate Old bd Module (2 tasks) - DONE
- [x] Phase 6: Testing & Documentation (3 tasks) - DONE

All 21 tasks complete. 107 tests passing.

See: docs/plans/2026-01-08-gastown-beads-redesign-impl.md
close_reason: All 6 phases (21 tasks) complete. 107 tests passing.

title: GUPP - Claude hooks 自動觸發機制
description:
實作 GUPP (Gastown Universal Propulsion Principle)：
- 利用 Claude Code hooks 在 beads 變更時觸發
- 自動 spawn workers 處理 ready tasks
- 所有任務完成時通知 mayor

實作項目:
- [ ] 實作 `gastown gupp check` 指令 (src/gupp/check.ts)
- [ ] 創建 `.claude/hooks/gupp.yaml`
- [ ] 實作 worker spawn 觸發邏輯 (src/gupp/trigger.ts)
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] src/gupp/check.ts detects ready work
- [ ] src/gupp/trigger.ts spawns workers
- [ ] gastown gupp check command works
- [ ] .claude/hooks/gupp.yaml created
- [ ] Tests pass

title: tmux 增強 - 角色標示與 context 顯示
description:
增強 tmux session 的顯示：
- status bar 顯示角色 icon、context 使用率、當前任務
- 每個 pane 標示角色
- 快捷鍵說明

實作項目:
- [ ] 實作 status bar 設定函數 (src/tmux/status.ts)
- [ ] 實作 context 使用率更新機制
- [ ] 更新 agent 啟動流程加入 status bar
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] src/tmux/status.ts created with ROLE_ICONS
- [ ] Status bar shows role, convoy, task
- [ ] Pane titles show role icons
- [ ] Styling applied on session launch
- [ ] Tests pass
